title: Warm Gloves
imageDescription: A pair of cozy knitted gloves with a warm orange/yellow color scheme, simple and friendly style, icon view on transparent background.

title: Auto Scratcher

title: Premium Catnip Toy
imageDescription: A small plush mouse toy in warm cream color with soft brown outline, subtle sage green accent on the ears, centered on transparent background. Simple rounded shapes with gentle shading.
